Class s_SpectralFluxFunctionThreshold

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.s_SpectralFluxFunctionThreshold

  • public class s_SpectralFluxFunctionThreshold
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates a threshold function based on the spectral flux.
    Author:
    badlogicgames@gmail.com

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      s_SpectralFluxFunctionThreshold(int historySize, float multiplier)
      Constructor, sets the history size in number of spectra to take into account to calculate the average spectral flux at a specific position.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.Float> calculate(java.util.List<java.lang.Float> spectralFlux)
      Returns the threshold function for a given spectral flux function.

    • Constructor Detail

      • s_SpectralFluxFunctionThreshold

        public s_SpectralFluxFunctionThreshold(int historySize,
                               float multiplier)
        Constructor, sets the history size in number of spectra to take into account to calculate the average spectral flux at a specific position. Also sets the multiplier to multiply the average with.
        Parameters:
        historySize - The history size.
        multiplier - The average multiplier.

        The threshold function.
